name: Jailbreak! (Rubidant)
description:
You're planning a jailbreak. Unfortunately your cellmate has all the luck, so you'll need him to escape. He will copy your every movement, so guide him through the maze-like prison complex in order to get the keys and push them into the locks. (You're on the left, he's on the right!)

Note: Your cellmate won't move vertically if you're more than one space apart, which is a feature and not a bug. You can use it to your advantage!
